content:
ReliableStateManagerConfiguration.ReplicatorSecuritySectionName Property

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Data.Interfaces.dll

In this Article

Gets the replicator security settings section name.

public string ReplicatorSecuritySectionName { get; }
Returns
String

The section name.

Remarks

If present in the config package specified by in Settings.xml, this section will be used to configure replicator security settings.
